DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the efficacy of baby talcum in prevent pruritus after cast application in orthopaedic patients. The investigators will do a randomized controlled trial in patient with fracture distal end of radius treated conservatively. Pruritus score and satisfaction will be monitor along the entire course of cast retention.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Baby Talcum in Prevention of Pruritus Assosiated With Cast
DOC.criteria: Fracture distal end radius treated conservatively open fracture skin disease and wound under cast area Fracture distal end radius needed surgical management Allergy to baby talcum
